1.1.name: wordpress/famous-quotes
1.1.description:
I guess you have wondered how to attract more people to your site. The best way is by creating interesting content. Except for interesting posts, you can add this widget, which generates some famous quotes by popular authors, each time the page loads. Thus your visitors get more engaging content and spend more time on your blog.

There are 1200 famous quotes in the plugin.

If you want buttons for changing the quote, after the page loads, and support for the widget get the extended version of the plugin.
